job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Site Reliability Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Sunnyvale, CA</strong></p><p><strong>6 Months</strong></p><p><br></p><p>5+ years of Experience in managing highly-scalable and distributed systems.</p><p>Knowledge of Web Services, HTTP/HTTPS Protocols.</p><p>Knowledge of Data Security, SSL, Certificates, etc.</p><p>Strong problem solving, and troubleshooting skills</p><p>Experience in performance tuning of the applications including JVM tuning, memory profiling.</p><p>Provide OnCall support to 1st level production support teams.</p><p>Fast learner who is generous with their knowledge</p><p>Self-directed, demonstrates leadership potential, and a great teammate.</p><p>Experience with container orchestration systems like Kubernetes, and Continuous Delivery platforms like Spinnaker, is a plus</p>
